biotools.summary: The Cervical Cancer gene DataBase is a manually curated catalog of experimentally validated genes that are involved in the different stages of cervical carcinogenesis. Each record contains details related to gene. It provides information on microRNA altered in cervical cancer as well as search facility for querying, several browse options and an online tool for sequence similarity search.

bioschemas.name: CCDB
